TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Exposes a generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of designer glyphs associated with an activity designer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection contains all designer glyphs that appear on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class with which the collection is associated.
You can access the contents of the ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection through the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> property.
